The Honey Wars is an upcoming animated film directed by Andrew Kavanagh and written by John Boorman.
Cast
* Jamie Lee Curtis
* Vanessa Kirby
* Patrick Stewart
* Brendan Gleeson
* Richard E. Grant
* Jon Voight
Production
In October 2024, John Boorman revealed he was working on an animated project titled The Honey Wars, with Jamie Lee Curtis, Vanessa Kirby, Patrick Stewart, Brendan Gleeson, Richard E. Grant and Jon Voight all eyed to star, and Kavaleer Productions producing the project.
